pkgmetadata.longdescription: Alpha and Beta Proximity to Irreplaceability // Functions to measure Alpha and Beta Proximity to Irreplaceability. The methods for Alpha and Beta irreplaceability were first described in: Baisero D., Schuster R. Plumptre A.J. Redefining and Mapping Global Irreplaceability. Conservation Biology 2021;1-11. doi:10.1111/cobi.13806.
